subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Very few people expected Raúl Jiménez and Andros Townsend to figure in such nerve-racking World Cup games, but they each propelled their teams to victory.
snippet: Very few people expected Raúl Jiménez and Andros Townsend to figure in such nerve-racking World Cup games, but they each propelled their teams to victory.
